Content:
# Thio's Browser-Based Tools Various utilities and tools that run locally right in your browser. ### How to Download

### Or use and bookmark the tools online Access the tools online via the links on this page: [ThioJoe.GitHub.io/Browser-Based-Tools](https://thiojoe.github.io/Browser-Based-Tools/) ------------- ## [Unicode Inspector](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ThioJoe/Browser-Based-Tools/main/Tools/Unicode%20Inspector/Unicode%20Inspector.html) Paste in text and it will tell you info about the individual characters

## [Tools For GitHub](Tools/GitHub%20Tools) ### [Repo Explorer](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ThioJoe/Browser-Based-Tools/main/Tools/GitHub%20Tools/Repo%20Explorer.html) Fetch all the repositories for a particular user/organization, with the ability to sort and filter them

### [Associated Organization Research Tool](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ThioJoe/Browser-Based-Tools/main/Tools/GitHub%20Tools/Associated%20Organization%20Research%20Tool.html) A tool to more easily find and verify authenticity of GitHub accounts owned by large companies who don't list all their official accounts anywhere.
Translation:
# Thio's Browser-Based Tools Various utilities and tools that run locally right in your browser. ### How to Download

### Or use and bookmark the tools online Access the tools online via the links on this page: [ThioJoe.GitHub.io/Browser-Based-Tools](https://thiojoe.github.io/Browser-Based-Tools/) ------------- ## [Unicode Inspector](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ThioJoe/Browser-Based-Tools/main/Tools/Unicode%20Inspector/Unicode%20Inspector.html) Paste in text and it will tell you info about the individual characters

## [Tools For GitHub](Tools/GitHub%20Tools) ### [Repo Explorer](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ThioJoe/Browser-Based-Tools/main/Tools/GitHub%20Tools/Repo%20Explorer.html) Fetch all the repositories for a particular user/organization, with the ability to sort and filter them

### [Associated Organization Research Tool](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ThioJoe/Browser-Based-Tools/main/Tools/GitHub%20Tools/Associated%20Organization%20Research%20Tool.html) A tool to more easily find and verify authenticity of GitHub accounts owned by large companies who don't list all their official accounts anywhere.
